bioconda.name: ray
bioconda.summary: Parallel genome assemblies for parallel DNA sequencing

biocontainers.name: ray
biocontainers.summary: De novoassembly of single genomes and metagenomes. also analyses microbe abundance and performs taxonomic profiling as well as making gene ontology profiling. it can also compare genomic content between samples.

biotools.summary: De novoassembly of single genomes and metagenomes. Also analyses microbe abundance and performs taxonomic profiling as well as making gene ontology profiling. It can also compare genomic content between samples.

bioschemas.name: Ray
bioschemas.summary: De novoassembly of single genomes and metagenomes. Also analyses microbe abundance and performs taxonomic profiling as well as making gene ontology profiling. It can also compare genomic content between samples.
